page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: There are{l4 }different clubs in Braco. The oldest club is the { {SUNDAY SCHOOL ,}it was formed {200 } years ago in 1784. The newest club is the {PLAYGROUP.}It was formed in 1975 which is 9 years ago. There are 6 clubs for children, 5 clubs for adults and 3 clubs for both adults and children. The {BOWLING CLUB }has got the most members, they have 53 members. The {ANCHOR BOYS }have the least amount of members, they have 11.The average cost of the clubs is Â£6.70 per person for a year's membership. the most popular day for a club is Thursday, and the least popular day of the week is Wednesday. The bowling club runs all week in the summer, and the playgroup runs on Monday Wednesday and Friday. {If you {lived in Braco which club would you {join? }
